content.html:
I just ran into a predictable way to reproduce this and have been debugging it with @nkoenig

A partial fix is the following:

diff -r 0a1913abd8c9 gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc
--- a/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc Mon Nov 04 13:21:29 2013 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc Mon Nov 04 15:18:14 2013 -0800
@@ -150,7 +150,7 @@
   // scene_info
   // this->responsePub = this->node->Advertise<msgs::Response>("~/response");
   this->responseSub = this->node->Subscribe("~/response",
-      &Scene::OnResponse, this);
+      &Scene::OnResponse, this, true);
   this->sceneSub = this->node->Subscribe("~/scene", &Scene::OnScene, this);

   this->sdf.reset(new sdf::Element);
